Importing other GIL files¶

You can import other GIL files using the import keyword. This will let you access any sequences and operations in that file. This is still incredibly glitchy, so proceed at your own risk.

You can import a file by name if it’s in the same directory as your current project or if it’s in your compiler’s Libraries folder. Otherwise, you can import a GIL file by its exact or relative path

GIL
